MAN.TITLE: standard_input
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: get Scicos block input port positions

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : vector of x coordinates of the block regular and event input ports
: vector of y coordinates of the block regular and event output ports
: vector of input ports types (+1 : regular port; -1:event port)

DESCRIPTION.P: standard_input is the Scilab function used to get standard blocks input port position and types in interfacing functions.
Port positions are computed, each time they are required, as a function of block dimensions.
